original_text: But he knew their thoughts, and said to the man which had the withered hand, Rise up, and stand forth in the midst. And he arose and stood forth.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들의 생각을 아시고 손 마른 사람에게 이르시되 일어나 한가운데 서라 하시니 그가 일어나 서거늘

sentences.original_text: and said to the man which had the withered hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마른 손을 가진 사람에게 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: and stand forth in the midst
And he arose and stood forth
